content.p: There are opportunities to study Lawrence's work at all levels within the School of English. We also welcome queries about postdoctoral study and regularly welcome visiting scholars from around the world. There are options to study Lawrence in all three of the Scool of English's single honours degrees. English BA English Language and Literature BA English with Creative Writing BA You can also combine study of English with another subject with a joint honours course. We welcome enquiries from people looking to study for a English PhD relating to DH Lawrence. Please contact centre director Dr Andrew Harrison for initial discussions about your research proposal. The Centre has a strong track record in assisting strong students to produce successful AHRC funding applications, and the University of Nottingham is the lead institution in the Midlands4Cities Doctoral Training Partnership, a collaboration of eight partner institutions across the midlands. There is extensive support for students of all levels both within the School of English and across the University.
